snippet: Farrell, 53, will miss the remainder of the season, and the bench coach Torey Lovullo will run the team in his absence.
abstract: Baseball Roundup; Boston Red Sox Manager John Farrell announces he will take medical leave for remainder of season following diagnosis of highly curable form of lymphoma; other baseball news noted.
lead_paragraph: Farrell, 53, will miss the remainder of the season, and the bench coach Torey Lovullo will run the team in his absence.

headline.main: Red Sox Manager John Farrell Takes Leave to Undergo Lymphoma Treatment
headline.print_headline: Red Sox’ Farrell Takes Leave to Have Cancer Treatments
